root.name: Let's Build An Android App: Test Driven Development (TDD) With Kotlin Coroutines
root.description: In this class, I take you through my basic process for Test Driven Development on Android, using Kotlin. Please note that I am deliberately trying to keep my explanations and lessons simple and practical, as I dislike the annoying jargon which permeates discussion of Testing and TDD.I also discuss best practices for:Creating a testable architecture Testing with suspend functions and launch coroutines How to create test doubles without any libraries How to organize a single entry point to test all Units in a class Plenty of discussion on implementing Coroutines on Android Please visit this link for the source code in this class.
